channel.title: Clashofclans - Esport News
channel.description: RSS wrapper of Clashofclans inbox Esport News

item.title: Welcome to Clash Esports!
item.description:
Hi Chief,

Welcome to the World of Clash of Clans Esports! To help you along, we‚Äôve gathered the most relevant information about the Clash of Clans competitive scene in this article. This will be your go to when wondering what tournaments are coming up and what is ongoing right now, but also for checking out some of the past tournament information.

This article will be frequently updated with new information so make sure you come back here to be up-to-date with what's happening!

Ongoing tournaments

Time for action! Here is a list of all Supercell supported Clash of Clans tournaments that are ongoing at the moment. Whether you're looking to play or watch, make sure to read the details below.

Clash of Clans World Championship 2024

The Clash of Clans World Championships are back for yet another year of amazing clashing! With a total of $1.000.000 on the line & 6 Golden Tickets up for grabs (4 from the monthly competitions, 1 from the Chinese Regional Qualifier and 1 from the Last Chance Qualifier), this is YOUR chance to secure a ticket to the Clash Worlds Finals!

Global Clash Cup Season 9

A brand new season of the Global Clash Cup is upon us and promises to be a heart-pounding thrill ride! From Town Hall 16 to 10, there are 10 electrifying divisions to choose from. Prepare to unleash your mastery and seize global victory, with $19,000 up for grabs for the boldest Clashers. The Gothic Division Champion will win a Silver Ticket to the World Championship Last Chance Qualifier!

  • Participation Criteria: Players must be at least 16 years of age to participate, subject to applicable laws and regulations of their country of residence. For players aged 16 to 17 (16 to 18 in South Korea and 16 to 19 in Japan), a parent or legal guardian must complete and submit the Parental/Legal Guardian Consent Form provided by GCC. 1.1.15. Players must reside in a country where Clash of Clans is available to download in the local application store and be the sole owner of the accounts used for participation in the league. Players residing in mainland China are not eligible to participate.

  • Prize Pool: $19,000

  • Rules: Read all the rules in GCC's Official Rulebook HERE!

  • Signups: Open, sign up HERE!

  • Status: Signups open.

  • Follow GCC on X (previously known as Twitter) to stay up to date with everything Global Clash Cup Related!

Clash Champs' Trophy Race

Organized by Clash Champs, the Trophy Race is a Tournament where the player that gets the most amount of trophies in a given time wins! Starting with Town Hall 9, the trophy race will feature an edition for each Town Hall level up to TH16!

Participation Criteria: All Players that reside in a country where Clash of Clans is available to download in the local app store are eligible to participate.

  • Prize Pool: Gems, Champs Bucks & Clash of Clans Merchandise.

  • Rules: Read all the rules in Clash Champs' Trophy Race official Rulebook!

  • Signups: Open, sign up HERE!

  • Status: Signups open.

  • Follow Clash Champs on X (previously known as Twitter) to stay up to date with everything Trophy Race related!

Past tournaments

Below you‚Äôll find some of the past tournaments where Clash players have battled for World Championship titles, prize money and glory. Check out some of the best plays and strategies from the best in the world and learn a trick or two!

Clash of Clans World Championship 2023

The Clash of Clans World Championships was back for yet another year of amazing clashing! With a total of $1.150.000 on the line & 8 Golden Tickets up for grabs (4 from community-organised tournaments & 4 from the official Championship Qualifier), this was the chance to secure a ticket to the Clash Worlds Finals that were held in Helsinki, Finland from the 24th to the 26th of November!

In order to participate, players needed to be at least 16 years old and have the highest Town Hall level.

  • The World Championship was free to play. Players were not required to pay anything to register and/or play.

  • Status: Finished

  • Winner: Clash Champs

  • Rewatch the entire competition here, or if you prefer to skip ahead to the main event, check out each day's stream below:

    • Day 1

    • Day 2

    • Day 3

Worlds Warmup 2024

The Clash of Clans Worlds Warmup was back in 2024! Featuring Town Hall 16 and a $30,000 USD prize pool it was BOUND to re-ignite the #ClashEsports scene!

To warm up for the 2024 Clash Worlds Championship season, this tournament's format started with 2 Open Qualifiers where 13 qualified teams (top teams from each Open Qualifier) advanced to the Group Stage where 3 Finalist teams from the 2023 World Championship joined them. The top 2 teams of each Group advanced for a face-off in the Playoffs.¬† Participation Criteria: All Players had to be at least +16years old and reside in a country where Clash of Clans was available to download in the local app store.

  • Prize Pool: $30,000

  • Rules: Worlds Warmup Rulebook HERE!

  • Signups: Closed

  • Status: Finished

  • Winner: Synchronic

North America Snapdragon Pro Series by ESL

The Snapdragon Pro Series in North America was back for Season 4! With a $60.000 prize pool and the title of North American Champion on the line, every TH15 player in that region had their chance to participate!

  • Tournament Structure: There was one Open Qualifier (ladder) in Season 4, where the 1st & 2nd place teams from the Open Ladder auto-qualified for Challenge phase. In the Open Finals, the next 16 best teams faced off in double-elimination brackets to determine who took the final six slots for the Challenge phase.

  • Participation Criteria: All players had to be older than 16 years old by the start of the tournament, reside in the selected region (North America), hold travel documents and be registered in ESL Play platform in order to participate. Only players with a Town Hall 15 were able to participate.

  • Prize Pool: $60.000 USD

  • Rules: You can find all the rules in the Official SPS Rulebook.

  • Signups: Closed.

  • Status: Finished

  • Winners - United Gaming

  • Follow ESL Clash of Clans X (previously known as Twitter) to stay updated with everything Snapdragon Pro Series related!

Europe & MENA Snapdragon Pro Series by ESL

With a $25.000 prize pool and the title of EUR&MENA Champion on the line, every TH15, TH12 & TH9 player in the region had their chance to participate!

  • Tournament Structure for TH15: Two 4-Day Open Ladder Sprints were played over two weeks. The Top 6 teams from these ladders qualified for the Open Finals. In the Open Finals, the 6 best teams faced each other in a double-elimination bracket to determine the winner!

  • Tournament Structure for Retro Cups: TH9 Retro Cup ‚ÄúNo Spam Allowed‚Äù - One single-elim cup played over two days, with Day 2 broadcasted. Witches, Hogs, & Drags were banned!

  • TH12 Retro Cup ‚ÄúNo Heals, No Artillery‚Äù - One single-elim cup played over two days, with Day 2 broadcasted. Siege Machines, Healers, + Heal Spells were banned!

  • Participation Criteria: All players had to be older than 16 years old by the start of the tournament, reside in the selected region (Europe & MENA), hold travel documents and be registered in ESL Play platform in order to participate.

  • Prize Pool: $25.000 USD

  • Rules: You can find all the rules in the Official SPS Rulebook.

  • Signups: Closed.

  • Status: Finished.

  • Follow ESL Clash of Clans X (previously known as Twitter) to stay up to date with everything Snapdragon Pro Series related!

Clash of Clans World Championship 2022

The official Clash of Clans World Championship happened throughout the year where teams had to compete in several community tournaments to claim a Golden Ticket for the World Finals with $1.000,000 on the line. 4 teams won the Golden Tickets and other 4 teams won the Championship Qualifiers. Those 8 teams battled in an epic World Finals live in-person event in Helsinki, Finland.

  • In order to participate, players needed to be at least 16 years old and have the highest Town Hall level.

  • The World Championship was free to play. Players were not required to pay anything to register and/or play.

  • Status: Finished

  • Winner: QueeN Walkers Stephanie

  • Rewatch the entire competition here, or if you prefer to skip ahead to the main event, check out each day's stream below:

    • Day 1

    • Day 2

    • Day 3

Global Clash Cup (GCC)

The Global Clash Cup, one of the most diverse community leagues, was back with yet another season that promised to be full of exciting matchups. With US$9,000 on the line, you could expect to see the best players from different Town Hall levels competing.

  • Tournament Structure: With 8 different divisions featuring different structures, the GCC was bound to cater several Town Hall levels and play styles! Check out all details in the official Esports divisions & Established divisions rulebooks!

  • Participation Criteria: Players had to reside in a country where Clash of Clans was available to download in the local application store and be the sole owner of the accounts used for participation in the league. Players residing in mainland China were not eligible to participate.

  • Prize Pool: $9,000

  • Rules: Esports divisions - Established divisions

  • Signups: Closed

  • Status: Finished

  • Winner: Tribe Gaming

  • Follow GCC on X (previously known as Twitter) to stay updated with everything Global Clash Cup related!

ClashMSTRS Gold

The fourth Golden Ticket Tournament of 2023, organized by ClashMSTRS, featured the same format as the other Golden Ticket Tournaments.

  • Tournament Structure: 2 Open Qualifiers where the top 8 teams of each moved forward to a 16-team Swiss stage where only the top 8 teams qualified for the double-elimination Playoffs!

  • Participation Criteria: All players had to be older than 16 years old by the start of the tournament. Only players with a Town Hall 15 were able to participate.

  • All tournament rules can be found HERE

  • Signups: Closed

  • Status: Finished

  • Golden Ticket Winner: Repotted Gaming

China Golden Ticket Tournament

The China Golden Ticket Tournament was a competition where the best Chinese teams could compete in order to win a Golden Ticket to the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals.

  • Tournament Structure: There were 4 Single Elimination Open Qualifiers, qualifying 4 teams in each for the Knock-out Stage, where the 16 teams competed in a Single Elimination Bracket, with the top 4 teams advancing to the Double Elimination Finals, where the winner was awarded a Golden Ticket for the Worlds Championship.

  • Participation Criteria: All players must be older than 16 years old by the start of the tournament. Only players with Town Hall 15 were able to participate. Only players residing in China were eligible to participate.

  • Prize Pool: ¬•300,000 RMB

  • Status: Finished

  • Golden Ticket Winner: Glory of Forever

Rush of Clans Golden Edition

The second Golden Ticket of 2023 was organised by RUSH and featured the same format as the other Golden Ticket Tournaments.

  • Tournament Structure: 2 Open Qualifiers where the top 8 teams of each moved forward to a 16-team Swiss stage where only the top 8 teams qualified for the double-elimination Playoffs!

  • Participation Criteria: All players were older than 16 years old by the start of the tournament. Only players with a Town Hall 15 were able to participate.

  • All tournament rules can be found HERE

  • To keep up to date on what‚Äôs happening follow Rush of Clans Twitter & Instagram pages!

  • Status: Finished

  • Signups: Closed

  • Golden Ticket Winner: Tribe Gaming

Queso Cup Golden Edition

Queso Cup was a global tournament with a Golden Ticket on the line. The winner of this tournament got a spot in the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals.

  • Tournament Structure: Starting with two Open Qualifiers, where the Top 8 teams from each Open Qualifier advanced to the Swiss Stage phase. In the Swiss Stage each team needed to win 3 times until there's 8 teams left. The 8 top teams advanced to the Playoffs where they battled in a double-elimination bracket with a possible Bracket Reset.

  • Participation Criteria: All players must be older than 16 years old by the start of the tournament. Only players with a Town Hall 15 will be able to participate.

  • All tournament rules can be found HERE

  • To keep up to date on what‚Äôs happening follow Queso Cup Twitter page!

  • Status: Finished

  • Golden Ticket winner: NAVI

North America Snapdragon Pro Series by ESL

The Snapdragon Pro Series in North America was back for Season 3! With a $60.000 prize pool and the title of North American Champion on the line, every TH15 player in the region got their chance to participate!

  • Tournament Structure: There was one Open Qualifier (ladder) in Season 3, where the 1st & 2nd place teams from the Open Ladder auto-qualified for Challenge. In the Open Finals, the next 16 best teams faced off in double-elimination brackets to determine who would take those final six Challenge slots.

  • Participation Criteria: All players had to be older than 16 years old by the start of the tournament, reside in the selected region (North America), hold travel documents and be registered in ESL Play platform in order to participate. Only players with a Town Hall 15 were able to participate.

  • Prize Pool: $60.000 USD

  • Rules: You can find all the rules in the Official SPS Rulebook.

  • Signups: Closed

  • Status: Finished

  • Follow ESL Clash of Clans on Twitter to stay updated with everything Snapdragon Pro Series related!

  • Winners: Aphelion Esports

Europe & MENA Snapdragon Pro Series by ESL

The Snapdragon Pro Series in EUR&MENA was back, this time with a new twist! With a $25.000 prize pool and the title of EUR&MENA Champion on the line, every TH15, TH12 & TH9 player in the region got their chance to participate!

  • Tournament Structure for TH15: Two 4-day Open Ladder Sprints was played over two weeks. The Top 6 teams from these ladders qualified for the Open Finals. In Open Finals, the 6 best teams faced off in a double-elimination bracket to determine the winner!

  • Tournament Structure for Retro Cups: TH9 Retro Cup ‚ÄúNo Spam Allowed‚Äù - Two single-elimination cups played over two days, with each Day 2 broadcasted.

    Witches, Hogs, & Drags were banned from play!

    TH12 Retro Cup ‚ÄúNo Heals, No Artillery‚Äù - Two single-elimination cups played over two days, with each Day 2 broadcasted.

    Siege Machines, Healers, and the Heal Spell were banned from play!

  • Participation Criteria: All players must be older than 16 years old by the start of the tournament, reside in the selected region (Europe & MENA), hold travel documents and be registered in ESL Play platform in order to participate.

  • Prize Pool: $25.000 USD

  • Rules: You can find all the rules in the Official SPS Rulebook.

  • Signups: Closed

  • Status: Finished

  • Follow ESL Clash of Clans on Twitter to stay up to date with everything Snapdragon Pro Series related!

CHAMPIONS WAR LEAGUE: DARE TO COMPETE!

CWL is one of the oldest organizations in the Clash of Clans Esports Scene, and they brought you CWL: Dare to Compete! - one of the biggest community-led events of the year.

  • Tournament Structure: Starting with a ladder stage, each team played a maximum of 6 wars per day for 7 consecutive days; from there, the Top 24 scored teams moved forward to the Group Stage, from which the Top 2 made it to the Double-Elimination Playoffs.

  • Participation Criteria: All players must be older than 16 years old by the start of the tournament. Only players with a Town Hall 15 will be able to participate.

  • Prize Pool: $20.000 USD

  • Rules: You can find all the rules in the Official CWL: Dare to Compete Rulebook.

  • Status: Finished

  • Winner: Tribe Gaming

  • Follow CWL on Twitter to stay up to date with everything CWL: Dare to Compete related!

Samsung's Galaxy Battles: Superverse

This event brought community members and content creators together to join forces and battle it out for a prize pool of $100,000. For the very first time, the Supercell universe collided with Clash of Clans, Brawl Stars, AND Clash Royale all in one event!

  • Tournament structure: 4 Qualifiers where the top 8 teams advanced to a Qualifier Final where 8 players qualified for the Grand Finals. In the Grand Finals, these 8 players joined forces with Content Creators and played in an all-out battle on Clash of Clans, Clash Royale & Brawl Stars.

  • Participation Criteria: Players had to be least 16+ years of age, or the age of majority in their resident jurisdiction (whichever is higher), at the time of registration. Only players with a Town Hall 15 will be able to participate.

  • Prize Pool: $100.000 USD

  • Rules: You can find all of the event rules HERE!

  • Sign-ups: Closed

  • Status: Finished

  • Winners: Team Juicy J!

We are always looking for more people to collaborate with and are eager to help our community grow! So if you want to explore running a tournament, start by checking out our Community Tournament Guidelines and reach out to us by email at tournaments@supercell.com!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Team

Apple is not a sponsor of, or responsible for conducting, the promotions or events.

item.title: Congratulations Clash Champs!
item.description:
After 3 days of intense competition, Clash Champs are your 2023 Clash of Clans World Champions!

Clash Champs rose to the top during this incredible Clash Fest weekend, earning the grand prize of $300,000 and taking home the World Champions trophy!

The Grand Finals showcased incredible skill, with Repotted Gaming finishing as this year‚Äôs runner-up. Congratulations are in order, as we celebrate their strong performances throughout the weekend as well!

Take a look at how all 8 of the World Championship Finalists fared this weekend:

As we wrap up this year's World Championship Finals, we extend our heartfelt gratitude to each team for dedicating months to intense competition. This event wouldn't be possible without the unwavering commitment of these formidable competitors. A massive thank you goes out to every viewer who joined us online or cheered from the audience here in Helsinki, as the energy was unmatched!

In case you missed any of today's excitement or previous days, you can watch the entire World Championship weekend on our YouTube! And, of course, stay connected with Clash of Clans Esports on Twitter and Instagram for the latest updates as we look forward to what‚Äôs next.

Thank you for an incredible 2023 season and Clash On!

-The Clash of Clans Team

item.title: World Championship returns for 2024!
item.description:
Clash Worlds returns for 2024!

Hello Chief! Brand new year means brand new World Championship in Clash of Clans! In this announcement you‚Äôll get an overview of the World Championship program designed for you to be able to compete against the best Clash of Clans teams in the world and secure yourself a share of the prize pool of $1.000,000!

Clash of Clans World Championship returns for 2024!

üì∫ [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

BACK TO OUR ROOTS

You loved it back in the day and so did we, so this year we are bringing back Monthly Competitions to the competitive world of Clash of Clans!¬†

The World Championship will in short consist of:

  • Four Monthly Competitions

  • One Chinese Regional Qualifier

  • One Last Chance Qualifier

  • And an in-person World Championship Final

MONTHLY COMPETITIONS

Starting in April through to July, every month will give you a chance to secure a Golden Ticket to World Championship Finals! Each Monthly Competition will have three phases; an Open Qualifier (or as we call it Phase 1), a 128 team Monthly Qualifier and a Monthly Final.

In short, if you win a Monthly Final you secure a Golden Ticket for your team to the World Championship Finals! But that‚Äôs not all. All the runner ups from each month will automatically guarantee themselves a spot at the Last Chance Qualifier. Second place matters!

You might wonder, well when exactly does it start? Don‚Äôt worry we‚Äôll keep you up to date, but it‚Äôs not like you can miss the Tournament Hub icon on your home screen when it‚Äôs time to sign up!

LAST CHANCE QUALIFIER

To keep it interesting all year around what would the year be without a Last Chance Qualifier! The four teams from the Monthly Competitions will face off several Community Tournament winners for a chance to win the last Golden Ticket to World Championship Finals.¬†

CHECK OUT THE FULL SCHEDULE!

  • April Monthly Qualifier dates:

    • Registrations - March 25th to 31st

    • Phase 1 - April 1st to 6th

    • Monthly Qualifier - April 13th & 14th

    • Monthly Finals - April 20th & 21st

  • May Monthly Qualifier dates:

    • Registrations - April 27th to 30th

    • Phase 1 - May 1st to 6th

    • Monthly Qualifier - May 18th & 19th

    • Monthly Finals - May 25th & 26th

  • June Monthly Qualifier dates:

    • Registrations - May 28th to 31st

    • Phase 1 - June 1st to 6th

    • Monthly Qualifier - June 15th & 16th

    • Monthly Finals - June 22nd & 23rd

  • July Monthly Qualifier dates:

    • Registrations- June 27th to 30th

    • Phase 1 - July 1st to 6th

    • Monthly Qualifier - July 13th & 14th

    • Monthly Finals - July 20th & 21st

  • Last Chance Qualifier dates:

    • September 7th & 8th

  • World Finals

    • November 2024

We know you have more questions, and we promise to answer them soon! Make sure to follow our in-game Esport News along with our Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website not to miss any of the details!

- The Clash of Clans Esports team

item.title: Rewatch the SPS NA Finals - Day 1!
Rewatch the SPS NA Finals - Day 2!
World Championship 2024 Schedule
item.description:
Hey Chief!

The 2024 Clash of Clans World Championship will start next month and we know you‚Äôve been eager to know more so the time has come for YOU to mark your calendars with all the relevant dates for this year‚Äôs World Championship! As we shared earlier this year, the 2024 World Championship will feature four Monthly Qualifiers, one Chinese Regional Qualifier, one Last Chance Qualifier and the World Finals.

This year‚Äôs Monthly Qualifiers will be divided into three phases (all played in the in-game Tournament Hub!):

  • Open Qualifier (Phase 1)¬†

  • Monthly Qualifier

  • Monthly Finals

Take a look at the official calendar and make sure to mark your calendars!

  • April Monthly Qualifier dates:

    • Registrations - March 26th to 31st

    • Phase 1 - April 1st to 6th

    • Monthly Qualifier - April 13th & 14th

    • Monthly Finals - April 20th & 21st

  • May Monthly Qualifier dates:

    • Registrations - April 27th to 30th

    • Phase 1 - May 1st to 6th

    • Monthly Qualifier - May 18th & 19th

    • Monthly Finals - May 25th & 26th

  • June Monthly Qualifier dates:

    • Registrations - May 28th to 31st

    • Phase 1 - June 1st to 6th

    • Monthly Qualifier - June 15th & 16th

    • Monthly Finals - June 22nd & 23rd

  • July Monthly Qualifier dates:

    • Registrations- June 27th to 30th

    • Phase 1 - July 1st to 6th

    • Monthly Qualifier - July 13th & 14th

    • Monthly Finals - July 20th & 21st

  • Last Chance Qualifier dates:

    • September 7th & 8th

  • World Finals

    • November 2024

As you probably know, Clan War Leagues will happen at the same time as the Phase 1 of each Monthly Qualifier but worry not!! This year every player will be able to play CWL & the Open Qualifiers!

That‚Äôs all for now Chief! Remember to stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Esports Website, X and Instagram to remain up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports team

item.title: Worlds Warmup Group Stage!
item.description:
Hi Chief,

After two intense Qualifiers the 2024 Worlds Warmup Group Stage teams are SET! With the title of Champion and the biggest share of the $30,000 prize pool on the line every team is bound to use their best Town Hall 16 skills and strategies to secure a spot in the Playoffs!

Joining the three invited Clash of Clans World Championship Finalist teams, 7 teams have made it from the first Open Qualifier and another 6 from the second.

The 16 teams will be divided into 4 groups in the Group Stage and will fight each other in a double Round Robin format - the top 2 teams from each group will advance to the Playoffs!

The stakes are high in the FIRST EVER official Town Hall 16 competition so make sure to mark your calendars not to miss anything of the Worlds Warmup Group Stage:

  • Day 1 - Saturday, March 16th at 12PM UTC

  • Day 2 - Sunday, March 17th at 12PM UTC

All the EPIC matches from the Group Stage will be broadcasted by your favourite community casters, so make sure to stay tuned to the in-game Esports news tab, Clash of Clans Esports X and Instagram to know where to watch the Group Stage in YOUR language!

Clash On!

  • The Clash of Clans Esports team

item.title: Rewatch the Worlds Warmup Group Stage Day 1!
Rewatch the Worlds Warmup Group Stage Day 2!
2024 Clash Worlds Rulebook and Format!
item.description:
Hi Chief,

We know that all of you have been eagerly awaiting for more details on the 2024 Clash of Clans World Championship and the time has finally come for us to share them with you!

First of all, make sure to read the Official Clash of Clans World Championship Rulebook for all the details!

This year‚Äôs Qualifiers will have three phases, the Open Qualifiers, the Monthly Qualifiers and the Monthly Finals. Check out the format below!

Make sure to read the Schedule article for all the relevant dates and mark them in your calendar not to miss a single chance to qualify!

The total Prize Pool for this year‚Äôs Clash Worlds will be $1.000.000 - while the details on the distribution for the Last Chance Qualifier and the World Finals are being prepared, take a look at the final distribution for the Monthly Finals!

That‚Äôs all for now! Make sure to Stay tuned to he Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Esports Website, X and Instagram to remain up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash On! - The Clash of Clans Esports team

item.title: Worlds Warmup Playoffs!
item.description:
Hi Chief,

After two intense Open Qualifiers and an EPIC Group Stage, the 8 finalist teams of the 2024 Worlds Warmup are ready to face-off for the biggest share of the $30,000 prize pool!

With the pressure at an all time high since the launch of Town Hall 16, only one team will leave the Worlds Warmup stage with the title of Champions!

Here are the 8 finalist teams:

These teams will surely bring out the best TH16 attack strategies and even better bases considering what‚Äôs at stake! Take a look at the prize pool distribution at stake!

The 8 finalist teams will face-off on a Double-Elimination bracket in the course of two days. Take a look at the bracket!

You can follow the live bracket during the weekend HERE! All the action will be streamed on the official Clash of Clans YouTube, Facebook, Twitch and TikTok Channels! Make sure to set a reminder NOW not to miss a second of the best Town Hall 16 action!

Day 1 - Saturday, March 23rd at 12 PM UTC Set a reminder HERE

Day 2 - Sunday, March 24th at 12 PM UTC Set a reminder HERE

Stay tuned to the in-game Esports news tab,Clash of Clans Esports X and Instagram to get all the details about the Worlds Warmup!

Best of luck to all team!

Clash On!

-The Clash of Clans Esports team.

item.title: Rewatch Day 1 of the Worlds Warmup Finals!
Rewatch the Worlds Warmup Finals!
Clash Worlds - All you need to know!
item.description:
Hi, Chief!

It‚Äôs that time of the year again! With the start of the 2024 Clash of Clans World Championship right around the corner, it‚Äôs time we break-down everything YOU need to know about how to claim your spot at the top, and become a World Champion!

Let‚Äôs start from the basics! We are going to back our roots, bringing back Monthly Competitions with a couple changes from the 2023 format - The 2024 World Championship will consist of the following:

  • Four Monthly Competitions

  • One Chinese Regional Qualifier

  • One Last Chance Qualifier

  • And an in-person World Championship Final

MONTHLY COMPETITIONS

Let‚Äôs take a look at how each Monthly Competition works! Each Monthly Competition has three phases:

  • The Open Qualifiers (Phase 1)

  • The Monthly Qualifiers (Phase 2)

  • The Monthly Finals (Phase 3)

The Open Qualifiers are a 6-day ladder competition hosted through the in-game Tournament Hub. The top 128 teams from the Open Qualifiers will advance to the Monthly Qualifiers: A double elimination bracket that will be played until only 6 teams remain. These 6 teams will move forward to the Monthly Finals: Similar to the Monthly Qualifiers, the Monthly Finals will¬†also be a double elimination bracket, where the original 6 teams will battle it out until one team comes out on top and wins the Golden Ticket. In addition, the runner-up in every Monthly Finals will receive a Silver Ticket, guaranteeing them a spot to compete in the Last Chance Qualifier - so don‚Äôt fret if you don‚Äôt receive a Golden Ticket!

The Last Chance Qualifier will consist of the four teams who earned a Silver Ticket in the four Monthly Competitions, in addition to the teams who earned a Silver Ticket in this year‚Äôs Community Tournaments. This will be an epic showdown to confirm the final team that will be participating in the 2024 World Championship Final!

DON‚ÄôT FORGET! In order to participate in the Monthly Competitions, make sure to sign up during the registration period! Registration for each Monthly Competition runs for 6 days, so don‚Äôt miss your chance to get in on the action!

Check out the full schedule below, or visit our World Championship 2024 Schedule for more information! Mark these dates in your calendar so you don‚Äôt miss a single chance to qualify!

April Monthly Qualifier dates:

  • Registrations - March 26th to 31st

  • Phase 1 - April 1st to 6th

  • Monthly Qualifier - April 13th & 14th

  • Monthly Finals - April 20th & 21st

May Monthly Qualifier dates:

  • Registrations - April 27th to 30th

  • Phase 1 - May 1st to 6th

  • Monthly Qualifier - May 18th & 19th

  • Monthly Finals - May 25th & 26th

June Monthly Qualifier dates:

  • Registrations - May 28th to 31st

  • Phase 1 - June 1st to 6th

  • Monthly Qualifier - June 15th & 16th

  • Monthly Finals - June 22nd & 23rd

July Monthly Qualifier dates:

  • Registrations- June 27th to 30th

  • Phase 1 - July 1st to 6th

  • Monthly Qualifier - July 13th & 14th

  • Monthly Finals - July 20th & 21st

Last Chance Qualifier dates:

  • September 7th & 8th

World Finals dates:

  • November 2024

Now, let‚Äôs not forget about the whopping $1.000.000 Prize Pool reserved for the 2024 World Championship! While the details of Prize Pool distribution for the Last Chance Qualifier and World Finals is being prepared, take a look at the Monthly Finals Prize Pool, outlined above. Each month there‚Äôs a total of $50,000 prize pool up for grabs for the top 6 teams!

You‚Äôre not going to want to miss any Clash Esports action this year, and we‚Äôve got multiple ways for you to tune in. Make sure to subscribe to the Clans of Clans YouTube, Twitch, Facebook & TikTok official channels, and turn notifications on, to not miss a single second!

That‚Äôs it, Chief! If you have any doubts or need assistance, check out the Official Rulebook! If your questions are still not answered, please reach out to clashofclans_admin@ee.gg to have all your questions about the World Championship answered! Please note that tournament administrators cannot assist with inquiries not related to the tournament, such as in-app purchases or account issues.

Stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you‚Äôre up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

item.title: Rewatch the April Monthly Qualifier Day 1!
Rewatch the April Monthly Qualifier Day 2!
April Monthly Finals - All you need to know!
item.description:
Hi, Chief!

With the April Monthly Qualifier complete, the next step in your journey is the April Monthly Finals - and oh boy, it‚Äôs going to be a good one!

The April Monthly Finals will be hosted across two days, April 20 - 21. Both days will start at 14:00 UTC, so make sure to put that in your calendar! Now, let‚Äôs get into it‚Ä¶

Let‚Äôs start off with the essential details! From the April Monthly Qualifier, 6 teams secured their spot in the April Monthly Finals - 2 in the Upper Bracket and 4 in the Lower Bracket. Seeding for the April Monthly Finals will be determined by each team‚Äôs placement in the April Monthly Qualifier - the 4 teams advancing from the Lower Bracket will start in Round 1 of the Upper Bracket, while the 2 teams advancing from the Upper Bracket will receive a bye in Round 1, and play their first match in Round 2. The higher the seed, the greater the advantage!

The 6 teams will face off in a two-day double-elimination tournament, hosted through the in-app Tournament Hub until 1 team will ultimately be crowned the April Monthly Finals Champion and secure their Golden Ticket. But that‚Äôs not all! The runner-up will receive a Silver Ticket and a spot in the Last Chance Qualifier! The first two Upper Bracket Rounds and the first Lower Bracket Round will be played on Day 1 (April 20), while all remaining Rounds and matches will be played on Day 2 (April 21).

Now, let‚Äôs take a closer look at the 6 teams that will be competing in the April Monthly Finals‚Ä¶

As mentioned, 6 teams will be competing in the April Monthly Finals - and let me tell you, they‚Äôre going to knock your troops off!

The 6 teams joining the April Monthly Finals are as follows, listed by their seed‚Ä¶ NAVI: NAVI consists of GAKU, Kazuma, Klaus, STARs and pCastro. Check out the team on Twitter! Millesime MG: Millesime MG consists of Natchoa, KingsMan, Hawk, TryHard and El Teemper. Check out the team on Twitter!

Free Agents: Free Agents consists of CELINHO, LoOPe, Pato, Bernaul and Leo. Check out the team on Twitter!

Synchronic Gaming: Synchronic Gaming consists of Einstein, Philipp, General X, Marc and Simon. Check out the team on Twitter!

VM Surgical: VM Surgical consists of Sami, Krzysztof, Ultra, Isma and Simon. Check out the team on Twitter!

Vatang: Vatang consists of Invincible LG, DP, Dream Walker, KIIIBEROS and LansLota. Check out the team on Twitter!

NAVI and Millesime MG will receive a bye in Upper Bracket Round 1, immediately starting their run in Upper Bracket Round 2, while Free Agents, Synchronic Gaming, VM Surgical and Vatang will battle it out in Upper Bracket Round 1. Now that we‚Äôve talked about the teams and players, let‚Äôs show some love to our Talent and Community Casters!

We‚Äôve got a star-studded cast for the April Monthly Finals!¬†

First, we have our official #ClashWorlds talent, who you will see on the English broadcasts‚Ä¶

CarbonFin

iTzu

Clash with Eric

But that isn‚Äôt all! There will also be a stellar cast of Community Casters covering a variety of languages for our fans all across the world‚Ä¶

ES: Zolokotroko, Style, Sockers and shioN

PT: RAFACOC, Marinaul and Bruna7cr

FR: Skarex COC, Optimus Prime

DE: Noobs iMTV

IT: Haplo80, Medda87

KR: FADA, JAEJINCOC

JP: yuta14

ID: Chief Rian Gaming

ZHTC: ÁÉèÈæú Turtle

It‚Äôs about time we start talking about the $$$...

Did somebody say‚Ä¶ Prize Pool?!? You heard that right - there will be a whopping $50,000 up for grabs in the April Monthly Final for the 6 participants. See the breakdown of Prize Pool distribution in the graphic above!

You‚Äôre not going to want to miss the FIRST Monthly Finals of the 2024 #ClashWorlds year. You‚Äôre probably wondering, ‚ÄúBut Chief, where can I watch the first showdown of my favorite Clash of Clans esports players?‚Äù LOOK NO FURTHER, because there are multiple ways to watch‚Ä¶

Our go-to location for watching the April Monthly Finals is the Clash of Clans Event Site. On the event site, you‚Äôll be able to watch the stream in 8 languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Italian, Korean, and Japanese! In addition, by signing in with your Supercell ID, you‚Äôll be able to earn in-game rewards - that‚Äôs right, you‚Äôll earn rewards just by watching! Check out the full list of Event Sites below‚Ä¶

English: https://event.supercell.com/clashofclans/en

German: https://event.supercell.com/clashofclans/de

French: https://event.supercell.com/clashofclans/fr

Italian: https://event.supercell.com/clashofclans/it

Spanish: https://event.supercell.com/clashofclans/es

Portuguese: https://event.supercell.com/clashofclans/pt

Japanese: https://event.supercell.com/clashofclans/jp

Korean: https://event.supercell.com/clashofclans/kr

That‚Äôs it, Chief! Mark your calendars and stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you‚Äôre up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

item.title: Rewatch Day 1 of the April Monthly Finals!
Rewatch Day 2 of the April Monthly Finals!
Congrats, Synchronic!
item.description:
Congrats to the April Monthly Finals Champions - Synchronic!

Hi, Chief!

After the intense Open Qualifier, followed by the epic Monthly Qualifier, culminating in the first Monthly Finals... The first 2024 Clash of Clans World Championship Finalist team is decided!

After an AMAZING Lower Bracket run forcing NAVI to a Grand Finals reset, Synchronic has claimed the April Monthly Finals Golden Ticket and the biggest share of the $50,000 prize pool!

Congratulations to General X, Simon, Marc, Philipp & Einstein!

Rewatch the epic two-day showdown of Synchronic's road to glory, securing their Golden Ticket and their spot at the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals!

üì∫ [EMBEDDED VIDEO] üì∫ [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

There are still 5 more Golden Tickets up for grabs in the upcoming Monthly Finals and Last Chance Qualifier - make sure to sign-up in the Tournament Hub for YOUR chance at making it to the World Finals! Stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you're up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash on!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

item.title: The Global Clash Cup is back!
item.description:
Hi Chief,

The ultimate battle for immortality is coming! A brand new season of Global Clash Cup is upon us and promises to be a heart-pounding thrill ride.¬†

From Town Hall 16 to 10, there are 10 electrifying divisions to choose from. Prepare to unleash your mastery and seize global victory, with $19,000 up for grabs for the boldest Clashers. The Gothic Division Champion will win a Silver Ticket to the World Championship Last Chance Qualifier!¬†

This is an opportunity to gain glory and engrave your name into the GCC history books. Join the GCC Discord server to apply! Applications open on Monday, May 6th at 12:00 UTC and close on Monday, May 27th at 12:00 UTC.¬†

Mark the key dates in your calendars!¬†

Divisions

Make your pick from 10 divisions. There is a division for every team!

Prize Pool

A staggering CASH PRIZE of $19,000 and MVP awards including Gold Passes, Sceneries and Hero Skins make up the prize pool. Check out the cash prize distribution below.¬†

Format

The season kicks off with the Qualifiers where teams strive to finish top of the pack. The top teams on the leaderboard at the end of the Qualifiers will advance to the Playoffs. The Playoffs will be in a single elimination format where teams are eliminated after one loss.¬†

The Grand Finale in the Eclectic, Baroque, Doric and Modern Divisions will be a best-of-2 match. In the Gothic Division, the top 8 teams from the Playoffs will advance to the Finals. The Finals is a 2-day double elimination event where teams are eliminated after two losses.¬†

Ready your team and apply NOW HERE! The battleground awaits your arrival.¬†

Read the Esports Divisions Rulebook and Established Divisions Rulebook for more information regarding Global Clash Cup Season 9!¬†

Do not miss out on any of the action! Visit the Global Clash Cup website and follow Global Clash Cup on X, Twitch and YouTube.

Clash on!
